__e: When you speak in sentences of less than two words, you're in trouble. I know it.
I mean, Kyle and I can, like... Can finish each other's sentences.
Font: Soon as I mention the fire, he starts speaking in two-word sentences, like he doesn't want to say too much or give too much away.
No, no, he's the 10-word. And believe me, he hates it.
Two sentences, and I already like you more than your brother.
You know her, she starts sentences and then she doesn't finish 'em.
I can't imagine how awful that must feel to be reduced to a few sentences about every mistake you ever made.
Because I'm making him look bad, and I can't be trusted not to leak quotes to my husband.
My...my, sentences forward I can't say !
